item.description: Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting Every third Tuesday @ 7 p.m. Sonoma Grille, 7366 Post Rd, North Kingstown, RI 02852 401-295-0800 Easy to get to, Cold beer and Great food. (What else could you ask for?) I talked to the manager John, and we have the back room to ourselves with the fireplace. All are welcome, Please RSVP if you can and tell a friend. (Early and late arrivals welcome) Go to: oathkeepers.org for more info. "Yours in Liberty" Randy Swanson 401-952-5015
item.name: Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting
